pullRequest.title: fix(): Edits to resolve sonar cloud vulnerabilites
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Edits in response to Vulnerability issues reported by SonarCloud

commit.message: fix(): Edits to resolve sonar cloud vulnerabilites

nodes.bodyText: Instead add a constructor, make fields final and add getters.

commit.message: refactor(): Annotate serializable names of public data class fields

nodes.bodyText: Why is this .get() but the other was not? Did we change the type? Also why do we take in null as one of the parameters?

Optional should not be a field. Make it a regular NameVersion. Annotate the field with @Nullable as well as the constructor paramter. Use Optional.ofNullable(bomToolProjectNameVersion) in getBomToolProjectNameVersion().
Do the same for rootDetectorEvaluationTree below.

I commented on DetectorToolResult. Once you make those changes, use the below code to not throw an exception.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        detectorNameVersionHandler.finalDecision().getChosenNameVersion().get(),
          
          
            
                        detectorNameVersionHandler.finalDecision().getChosenNameVersion().orElse(null),

commit.message: refactor: Made fields in DetectorToolResult not Optionals
